Armor (Shield), Rare (Requires Attunement)
The shield has 3 charges, and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. If you are holding the shield, you can target a creature within 5 feet as an action. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be sucked into the airless void within the shield itself and be teleported 60 feet to an unoccupied space of your choice.
